p: Different washing steps have been proposed to remove salts for food applications [ 77]. After the evaporation of the washing water, the remaining solid biomass has a higher protein content from 11 to 24% and energy content from 20 to 50%. Regarding Ulva phenotypes, the content in salts goes from 29% to 36% with Na/K ratios from 1.1 to 2.2 and a maximum at 19% ulvan.
